card_text: 2 Spellcaster monsters$NIf this card is Link Summoned: Place 1 Spell Counter on it. Gains 300 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can only activate each of the following effects of "Day-Breaker the Shining Magical Warrior" once per turn.$N●If a Spellcaster monster(s) is Special Summoned to a zone(s) this card points to: Place 1 Spell Counter on this card.$N●You can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
